content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
Congratulations, you've won a free TV! Just reply with your credit card number to claim.
It seems like your message isn't related to our home services. If you need assistance with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC, please let me know. Otherwise, we will have to mark this number as spam.
Buy cheap meds here: onlinefastpharmacy.com. Call now!
Due to repeated unrelated and promotional messages, we have marked this number as spam and will no longer respond. Have a good day.
reason: Customer sent repeated spam messages unrelated to services.
